thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Elizabeth

author: Elizabeth
title: Elizabeth
text:
Dealing with a large amount of debt is extremely stressful. I got to a point where I knew I needed a professional to help me figure out a solution.
I had spoken to a financial advisor who suggested a consumer proposal as my best option for dealing with my debt.
I researched companies online and David Sklar & Associates had good reviews.
I called and set up an appointment and brought all the documents they required for the consultation
I met with Jackie and she was really lovely to deal with. She was not judgemental and gave me honest facts about what I could do and the impact it would have on my credit rating.
She offered me great advice and tips on how I can better manage my finances and how I can rebuild my credit.
I was extremely satisfied with her service and my experience.
I highly recommend anyone dealing with financial difficulties to give them a call.
